response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds immense value to us, but considering its significance to you, we believe it's time to share its benefits with someone who truly appreciates it. We are offering this remarkable product to you at a special price of $950,000. This represents a significant saving compared to its market value of $1,200,000 and allows us to ensure it goes to someone who values it as much as we do. Please let us know if you're interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 950000}
